entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING ENDED, Matagami
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:47 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -10.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Matagami Airport 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -10.5°C
Pressure: 98.1 kPa
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -12.4°C
Wind: SW 24 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
